level.text: Subject to ยง 6801.2, a license issued pursuant to this chapter shall expire at 12:00 midnight of March 31st of each even-numbered year.

If the Director changes the renewal system pursuant to ยง4006.3 of chapter 40 of this title, a license issued pursuant to this chapter shall expire at 12:00 midnight of the last day of the month of the birthdate of the holder of the license, or other date established by the Director.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 955 (February 12, 1988); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 8072 (August 17, 2007).
